DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study study HIV disease progression HIV-infected Thai child .
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , observational cohort study . HIV-infected child 5 institution follow assess HIV disease progression : 1 . Bamrasnaradura infectious disease institute,2 . Faculty Medicine Siriraj Hospital , Mahidol University , 3 . Chiangrai Prachanukroh Hospital , 4 . Sanpatong Hospital 5 . HIV-NAT , Thai Red Cross AIDS Research Center .
DOC.criteria: 1. age < 18 year old 2 . Have confirm HIV infection ( ELISA , HIVDNA PCR , HIVRNA PCR ) 3 . Signed consent form 1 . Hospitalization 2 . Emergency case 3 . Incomplete Medical Record
